chrome.notes: Speech recognition interfaces are currently prefixed in Chrome, so you'll need to prefix interface names appropriately, e.g. webkitSpeechRecognition; You'll also need to serve your code through a web server for recognition to work. Speech synthesis is fully supported without prefixes.

chrome_android.notes: Speech recognition interfaces are currently prefixed in Chrome, so you'll need to prefix interface names appropriately, e.g. webkitSpeechRecognition; You'll also need to serve your code through a web server for recognition to work. Speech synthesis is fully supported without prefixes.

firefox.notes: Note that currently only the speech synthesis part is available in Firefox Desktop â€” the speech recognition part will be available soon, once the required internal permissions are sorted out.
